# Syntax Highlighting Example

```javascript
function addition (a, b) {
	return a + b
}
```

```yaml
# YAML Configuration Example
server:
  host: localhost
  port: 8080
  ssl:
    enabled: true
    cert: /path/to/cert.pem

database:
  type: postgresql
  connection:
    host: db.example.com
    port: 5432
    credentials:
      user: admin
      password: secret

features:
  - name: authentication
    enabled: true
  - name: logging
    enabled: false
```
